content.detailedDescription: It was 1972 in wonder oregon on waters creek..We had company over to watch portland wrestling at 9p.M. the greens i have 4 kids and they had 2 ..We lived near no one  but as we began to watch the show we couldnt see it as it looked like a car was running and generater interference. i went out side to see if someone was parked out there with the motor running...Didn't see anything went out again as there was still interference and saw this huge globe hanging over the house glowing as if i were looking at the moon same color only like a pendulum hanging over the house..I called in to everyone and said a u.F.O> is here bring me a flash light and i want to signal it...Well from there on it got weird i signaled it and it appeared like it turned its light off nothing there could see the sky everything then poof it was back on again and here..I signaled over and over again as it was playing with us speeding straight up out of sight ,then back hovering then side ways across the trees out of sight then back it answered every signal..There was no noise coming from it..All of a sudden it got huger and huger bigger than the house i knew it was landing or something  i told the kids quick get inside as it was landing...From then on we all remember different things..I dont remember anything until later i asked the family if wwe should look and see if it was out there still...I dont remember of watching any wrestling,dont know what happened to our company didnt even think about that till recently...There is time missing dont know how much...My kids remember being on the ship, my youngest said they showed him how it workde and flew us  around...The kids saw a beam of light come in our door way but i cannot remember ..It took us all ..We talk about it every time we see each other ..Didnt report it as people think you are nuts..We all want to be hypnotised to remember as we all remember different things..We know we was on that ship...None of us have been able to afford hypnotherapy i am 66 and still want to know...My youngest son went into the army and called home to ask me when he had surgery on his kidneys..I thought he was drunk..He was in the military hospital and they found 2 surgical scars on each side of his back on his kidneys..He had never been in the hospital..Later in washington the critters grey and short came in my bedroom ane inserted something into my left nostril. leaving blood on my pillow..Not seen them since...Please someone get back to me i have always wanted to know some answers it is a daily thought that never goes away..
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Interupted a wrestling show on t.V. 9p.M.

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i witnessed a ufo last night over the nw las vegas  valley.  i was outside in my bark yard while my dog relieved himself when i noticed an object the size of a small aircraft flying in our general direction.  the reason i keot looking was because the object did not have blinking lights like a normal aircraft does.  i called my wife out to witness what i was looking at and my two daughters and grandson came out to seewhat was going on. 

it lasted about 10 minutes or so.  in that time the  sphere shaped thing drifted in a southwesterly direction and then stopped and  changed from bright flashes of white/yellow to orange to  red.  while i went inside to get my camera with a tele-photo lens, my  family witnessed this thing start to strobe it's lights.  when i came out i  photographed it.  from where we stood in our back yard the thing  looked about the size of a small aircraft.  the troubling  thing was what happed next.  the thing began dropping what looked like  small fire balls from the bottom of the craft.  they looked like they fell  as normal as any heavy object might fall to earth - there were approximately 10  things that dropped, it seems like around the vicinity of lone mountain. right after i took the one photograph the object drifted away in a more norhtwesterly direction and we lost sihgt of it.

i have a photo of the object, but my software is not very good and i  cannot enhance the photo to get a clear outline of the object - maybe you  can help with that.  while i was trying to enlarge the photo i pannedover to the left side of the object and found that there was another smaller object to the west of the main object, and then i remembered that my grandson had said that he had seen another object as well. 

i thought about going out to look around to see if i might find whatever it is that was dropped from that craft but now i'm notso sure i should. 

my name is robert lucero and you can reach me at 277-4937 if you  want. 
either way, i have always believed in ufo's and now i, and my  family, have
witnessed a real ufo.
content.summary: My family and i witnessed a ufo on wednesday evening 12/19/2007 over the las vegas skies.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my wife were just about asleep when our big chow dog jumped on our bed standing looking out the window. i kicked him off. he never does that when i'm in bed. then he did it again, my wife said rick look at him so i looked at him. he was standing still as can be staring out the window and growling. i sat up right away and he stayed there without looking at me at all. i looked out side down at the pool but no one was there.( we were in a two story apt.) i looked back at the dog and he wasn't looking at the ground but the sky!!! so i looked up there, it was so quiet and still. no clouds were moving. then desending from the clouds was a flying saucer as clear as can be. it had lights under the bottom of it, maybe about 10 in the middle as a circle pattern. the lights were all the same color, the same light color as a candles glow. the sky was normally lite by the city so it wasn't dark. when the saucer came straight down from the clouds slowly it was revolving slowly and made a small circle just under the cloud lining then as if it can see the clouds it went straight up the hole in the clouds that it made when it desended. now when the saucer went up it looked like it pulled some of the clouds after it, like a wake in a pool. by the time i said "there's a ufo!" my wife just missed it. we sat there for hours waiting to see it appear at the far edges of the entire cloud. (the cloud was pretty far, about the size of tempe itself. what is remarkable is that the saucer was close, so close that it would take a basketball at arms length to hide it, yet!!! soon came a regular americawest airliner stil under the cloud lining. that same cloud that never moved. the saucer was an easy 30 times bigger than it! also the lights of the plane were differant than the lights on the saucer, they were brilliant and white.
 the next day we called 911,,,they laughed and told us to call the airport skyharbor tower, they gave me the number. i called and they laughed at me too. i was sort of upset because all i wanted to do is let somebody know.
 prior to this i never believed in ufo's because being a strong born again christian at the time, i believed it was just people who dabble with the occult, i was wrong the object was real and was out there and not an aperation at all. i never did draw it although i am an artist, i can still picture it. 
    rick espejo, former federal courtroom sketch artist. for kpho
content.summary: Desended from cloud overhead revolved in a circle then went back up in same exact spot.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving work (on the east side of columbus, ohio, near easton). 

as i walked to the parking lot i noticed a flat object in the distance. i thought it first to be an airplane. as i looked closer, it appeared to oscillate. i stopped and observed as closely as possible and watched until i could no longer see it. the object moved from south-east to north-west of my position passing overhead. and i noted that i could see up through the center. it was virtually identical, in shape, to an 8mm washer (the kind used between a nut/bolt). 

the cloud ceiling was low, but there was no haze. it was not yet dusk, so visibility was high. the object contrasted sharply against the lit sky. there was no light source (sun, etc.) disrupting my vision. i can not estimate an altitude, but the object was below the cloud ceiling as it was clearly visible. i could not have seen the object more clearly. trajectory (speed and direction) appeared constant. i heard no sound.

at arm's length, when directly overhead, the object extended just over the width of my thumb.

i observed the object until it became too distant (north-west) to observe.

as soon as i could no longer see the object, i got into my car and drew diagrams of the object, the direction of travel, my position in relation to the sidewalk/trees/etc. the movement of the object, and i noted the time of the event. i do have the diagrams and drawings, and can make those available if necessary. (i do not have a scanner and would need to get my hand-drawings scanned at a copy center).

the event happened one hour and 10 minutes prior to my entry of this report.

i noticed the object due to its contrast to the sky, its unusual motion, and due to my interest in such topics.

my feelings/reactions were curiosity. i was slightly excited to be witnessing, yet trying to determine what the object might be - a lightweight balloon, a plastic disc, etc. only when i exhausted the alternatives (as i observed the object), i decided to make notes and submit the report. i was calm and clear-headed through the event.
content.summary: Oscillating disc with constant altitude and trajectory south-east to north-west passed directly overhead

content.detailedDescription:
On november 3, 1982 i lived in lancaster, ca. which is located in the mojave desert near edwards air force base.  i didn't have curtains at that time on my window.  i woke up to a bright white light shining in my window, which looked to be about 25 miles away or so, in the area of littlerock, ca. it was so bright, cigar shaped and huge to be able to see it so far away.
i was shocked to say the least and couldn't take my eyes off of it. i was afraid to blink, and it lasted about 25 seconds and dissapeared. i remember the exact date, because it was my brother in law's birthday and at the time, i remember thinking i'll never forget this day, seeing a ufo on his birthday.
i only told a few people because at that time you would be thought of as crazy and not ever taken seriously.
content.summary: I woke up to see a cigar shaped object in the distance through my window.

content.detailedDescription:
We were snapping off photos of the falls just before lunch and did not see the ufo until we downloaded the photos on the computer. i noticed that there was this dark missle looking thing in the distance and when i zoomed in on it, it did not look like any plane.

  

  thanks,

  jm
content.summary: Dark, missle shaped with pointed ends

content.detailedDescription:
On 11/6/07, i was driving home from work and stuck in 5 o'clock traffic. the sun just went down so there was still light. i notice in front of me a few miles away this object coming at me. at first i thought it was a helicopter but i thought it odd that it didn't have it's light on. it was moving at a steady rate about 45-50 mph. as it got closer it moved to my left. it was about 300 feet up and about 500 feet away. it looked like big black balloons meshed together. it's weird, it seemed to change shape as it got closer. it stayed in a straight line and headed south then went out of my sight. i thought that hundreds of people must have seen this. as soon as i got home i wrote down what i saw then i called the tv station to see if anybody reported anything. they said it might be the shuttle landing.

i live in sparks nv and this happened at 5:08 in between york and mccarren. it flew right over raleys heading sw toward mt rose. there was no wind and no sound. i've never seen anything like it and i'm sure there are allot more people who saw it. i wish i would have had a video cam.
content.summary: I saw this black glob while stuck in traffic.

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo seen was still at sunset on the horizon to the north, it appeared to be a comet but without  and three nuclei bright

the ufo seen here was still at sunset on the horizon to the north, it appeared to be a comet but with three bright nuclei. a few days before the afternoon also another ufo which left a line of smoke, but it was not a plane. a few days after the day of ufo seen in this report and the picture that you can see that they continued shipping rare events reported and many people also see an object at sunset, leaving a trail of smoke in the sky. on that last evening that the activity was reported a local tv channel (chronicle tv) was transmitting live in a protest on a route and i saw that people looked at the sky and just realized that there was an object crosses unusual about them leaving a trail. it was reported live, it was not shot but if the smoke left. this ends to give credence to my report and the strange activity ufo in my town these two weeks. i have seen several ufos here and the photo i saw him when he went to the car by the road 3 that crosses buenos aires. the photo did not take me, but that is what i saw. the photo was taken with a telescope with a zoom of 40x and was rising by another user in the page of a local group of ufo research. the picture taken is incredible, true and authentic. 
sources: www.Glaucoart.Com.Ar 
          www.Cronicatv.Com.Ar 
this is the object that visited buenos aires in may, but was filmed well in mar del plata .. here is the video. 


credits 
thanks.


this is the objet that i saw and the ufo reported in may 2007...Here in video

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=_3jxccx3flm&feature=related)
content.summary: It appeared to be a comet but with three nuclei bright.

content.detailedDescription: When i first started seeing ufo's regularly (last may) the first thing i thought of was the prophet yahwey, so as soon as i was able to speak to them, i asked them about the so called prophet yahwey, and they told me he was a liar, and used them for his own financial gain and that the true god is within all of us and the only one who will ever judge us is ourselves. so don't be fooled by a false prophet that can no longer summon our friends from another world. just ask him to summon them. he won't be able to. but you probably can because the want you to help stop the false prophet.
content.summary: The balloons told me they don't speak to the prophet yahwey anymore and that he lied to them

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were sitting at our desks in the office in cardiff. the office looks over the cardiff suburb of llanishen and we have a great view of huge sky above and around us from the 2nd (3rd if you count the underground carpark) floor.

my friend exclaimed that there were something in the sky - asking what it was - and i looked up.

what we saw, in the cloudless sky, was a fat ball of white smoke/cloud, seemingly quite wispy, if i recall, moving across the sky. we wouldn't have been surprised at seeing a cloud (which it first looked like), if it hadn't been moving at considerable speed. not helicopter speed, but certainly the sort of speed you would associate with a really windy day. and it wasn't windy. 

it also appeared to have a triangular 'tail' coming out of it  - on the right as you looked at it. afterwards, when i drew it, someone commented that it looked like an ice cream in a cone that was on its side. when we saw it, it seemed like a cloud doing an impression of a fat meteor!

another thing we should say is that it was fairly big in the sky, so it seemed to be fairly close. not like a, say, airplane would look like from the window.

we were really excited and baffled by it! we ran to the window on the adjacent side of the building as the object appeared to be moving that way. it looked fairly underwhelming from the new angle (how disappointed were we not to stay viewing it from our original vantage point!) and appeared to be disintegrating. i ran back to the original angle and could no longer see it. i then went back to the other window and it had totally disappeared.

the only explanation i could think of was that it was a smouldering/burning weather balloon as it was carried across the sky before disintegrating totally.

hm...Was it? it was unexplained and i'd be interested if anyone could shed some light on it.

scrambling, i took the photo on my phone but should have taken a video clip to show the movement. i couldn't really see what i was taking through my phone though and sadly it now looks like a crap cloud! grr!

all in all though, whatever it was, we found it exciting and rather fascinating!
content.summary: Fat ball and ice-cream cone-shaped 'cloud' crossing sky on low-wind day.

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern, i have been exposed to the art of summoning ufo's! i noticed throughout my younger years from time to time (at least once a year since 14) that a ufo would be following me. orbs, saucers and even cigar shaped craft. at a certain point i realized they where intentionally revealing themselves to me. when i would think, "oh that wasn't real" they would reappear to affirm my doubts as false! after i meet prophet yahweh i learned to control this phenomena. whenever i pray in the name of yahweh for a sighting they come...The only times they don't show is when we try to impress people, non-proper weather conditions, or too much air traffic!
i am only sharing this for my questions to be answered, because they don't land to talk to me. or at least as far as i remember!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: After prayer to yahweh, amen ufo appeared and flew eastward, then disappeared!

content.detailedDescription: I was putting my dog in his kennel as i noticed a chevron shaped object just over the hillside on my property.  at firt i thought it was a plane until i looked more closely.  you cluld see the outline of the object as it swayed back and forth. it was much longer than a plane and it moved from side to side.  after about 35 minutes of watching it move several hundred yards side to side it dipped behind the hillside.  this object was under 2 miles away from me so if it was a plane or a helicopter i would have definatley heard it.
content.summary: Chevron shaped object hovered slowly back and forth over my property for over a half an hour

content.detailedDescription: I am an amateur photographer. i've been taking photographs seriously for 20 years and was attempting to photograph a view of the city with the snow on the rooftops. i normally use a tripod but inadvertantly left it at home. i took a shot from a elevated location above the city looking south-east. i then repeated the shot as i felt i hadn't leveled the horizon adequately. the 2 shots were taken 16 seconds apart, hand held at 1/13 of a second on a canon eos300d digital camera. it wasn't until i got home and uploaded the images onto my computer that i saw the object. i normally adjust coulour, contrast and remove any dust spots at this stage. i enlarged the image to 100% and was surprised at seeing a strange shape above the distant buildings. it's not a dust spot. i have a lot of experience removing dust spots and this isn't one. it wasn't a speck on the lens as it wasn't present in the preceding or following images. it's not like any bird i've ever photographed. there's no detail to it. also the way the light reflects is lightest on top and the right, and shaded on the bottom and left consistent with the position of the sun and lightest part of the sky. it was mid afternoon in winter, the sun, the light source was in the clouds out of frame to the right. on enlarging the object it appears cigar or oval shaped with no hard lines. by the contrasts of light and dark compared with those on the ground, given that it's a hazy winter day, it appears to be over the far side of the city. if it were a bird nearer the camera it would be darker and have more shape. also about 5-10 minutes after the shot was taken an aircraft operated by romanian airline carpatair landed at the local airport aproaching from the right and landing to the left on a flightpath that took it over the center of the scene and through where the object was moments before. i would be interested to know if they or the airport saw anything. i don't know if it was a 'spaceship' but it is definitely unidentified and unexplainable.
content.summary: Unexplained object photographed over city of cluj napoca, romania

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside on my deck because my dog was barking even though that isn't unusual.  looked in the general direction of the ocean. thought what i was seeing was mars because of the color then realized it was much too red.  it moved laterally.  then the light went off.  the light reappeared for a few seconds and then disappeared completely.  all of this happened in less than five minutes.  there was no noise.  there are no airports here except a landing strip which is rarely used at night.  the night was clear and cloudless.

my first thoughts were that it was a ufo.  the island where i live is surrounded by water, which may or may not be related, but there have been numerous sightings.  i have seen one very close up and have had a few other sightings in the distance.

is it possible to find out if anyone else also saw unusual lights in the sky last night?

thanks, beverly
content.summary: Red light moved with no sound, turned on and off, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
The witness was walking on the beach at cherie down park, near coco beach fl.
as he looked out over the ocean he saw a navy sub going out and over cape canaveral he saw an object like an inverted pie pan, metallic in appearance.There was an extension on top which he described as a plastic cake cover. the object had a horizontal line around the center. the object had no wings or propellors and there was no smoke coming from it. it was over the restricted air space at cape canaveral.  he viewed it for about a minute, then when he looked away at the submarine, the object had simply disappeared.  

a woman was with the witness, but since she is blind, he did not mention the unidentified object to her.
content.summary: Ufo over cape canaveral

content.detailedDescription: I was at my brother's house in winfield and we were sitting in the backyard. there's a small cornfield in the back so the sky is viewable for miles. my other brother was shooting his arrows at a target and all of the sudden we heard him gasp. he pointed to the sky and we saw this exact object hovering above a cemetery accross the cornfield. the object was moving, but at a very slow pace. the movement of the object was very smooth from what i remeber. there were no sounds, so it was not an airplane. the object looked like a ringed-planet with a metallic reflection. my thought of it being a plane was then lost. i had never beleived in ufos and thought of everyone who did as crazy. the object had breif periods of pause, and then continued to glide through the sky at a constant height. i was taking pictures of my brother and his arrows prior to the incident. the camera was a throw-away so the picture came out blurred and the detail is poor which i apologize for. the three of us just starred at the object as it glided over assumption cemetery. just for your idea of the location, assumption cemetery is across from cantigny park. after almost three minutes of watching, the object went higher and then stopped. it then slashed into the sky, leaving a short trail of cloudy white gas. later that night, my brother called us around 10:45 pm saying he saw "glowing green streams slithering" in the same area we had seen the object. this was a scary event and now i truly beleive in ufos. i went to bed shortly after the phone call.
content.summary: I caught this in winfield in my brother's backyard. the area is very open. flashes of light later that night.

content.detailedDescription: Four of us were riding on ocean bvd (heading south) in newport ri trying to observe the seacoast homes (it was dark).  as we passed the last ocean front homes and looked out at the open water, i noticed lights over the water's surface, appearing perhaps as far out as the furtherest house jutting out on a peninsula earlier.  the lights were vertical, 3 equidistant rows of orange-yellow color, that seemed to hover over the water.  i would estimate that the size of the object was equal to my thumb nail at arms-length.  i asked the others in the car what they thought the lights were.  i have been to the area many times in the past and know that there are no bouys or other objects where the lights were located.  we tried to explain the lights as a boat, buoy, island of rocks, but it didn't seem plausible.  i stopped the car.  there were no other cars coming in either direction, so i drove left facing the lights and turned on my high beams.  we still could not make out any shape behind the lights.  i backed up and proceeded southerly slowly watching the lights when my son's girlfriend exclaimed "look, it's moving".  when i looked it moved rapidly to the south, still just above the water.  i accelerated down the road to try to keep up with the lights.  it stopped abruptly and i caught up in perhaps 5 - 10 seconds.  my wife was frantic at this point wanting to leave while my son's girlfriend was laughing, perhaps nervously.  at this point we all realized (me, my son, his friend, and my wife)that we weren't just looking at normal lights.  i drove down to the point, turned again in its direction, and again not seeing anything other than the lights, went north back in the direction we had come.  the lights stayed in the position we last saw them, so we slowly drove away.  the next day we went back in daylight and confirmed the lack of any structure in the bay area.
content.summary: Hovering lights over bay off ocean blvd newport, ri

content.detailedDescription: While on my lunch break i was siting out back and looked up.I observed a round,bronze colored disk flying towords me overhead.It made no sound and was moving from a north to south direction.(against the wind)the speed was best described as fluid.The sighting lasted about 40-50 seconds when it entered into a cloud and did not apear out the other side.The color was not shiney but more of a muted color.However it should have come out of the other side of the cloud it went into.(i would think).I have seen alot of strange things in 22 years of law enforcement so i guess i was more observing than feeling anything.
content.summary: I actualy saw a bronze shaped disc in broad day light flying aprox. 500feet over head.Disc about 30-35 feet across

content.detailedDescription: I was amazed and stunned while going home from my daughters house late friday eveing of 4/6/07.  i came to a stop sign at county rd 450s and county road 300 west and looked northeast to see a large white light shinning down on a tree at the edge of the wooded area.  i felt something was strange about this right from the start since it immediately switched off the white beam of lihgt as soon as i stopped and watched the object. it came across the road 425 north and across the bean & corn fields and never turned on any lights and it was a cool clear night.  it appeared black and rectangular and looked like it was going to come right over me when it stopped across the road from me and hovered for a minute or so. i was scared at this point and with my window rolled down i never heard any noise such as an engine etc. i was glad it turned and went slowly about 4-5 mph over county road 300 west and county road 500 or gem road.  i was determined to get a better look so i raced to the stop at 300 & gem rd. it was turning on side lights that looked like old round automobile lights but larger that where white and blinked on and off in some kind of sequence. i could see a cloud or mist surrounding the objcet and it was circular and silver or gray in color.  it has three lights on the side that i viewed and appeared to be headed to the south towards us 52 i would guess just east of german church rd and gem road.  i watch it till it moved over the tree line and out of sight.  i would guess it to have been 30 feet across.  i went home and called my sister and told her you would never guess what i have witnessed.  i called the local authorites the next day and spoke to a marion county sheriff and was told that no other reports were called in about the object.  i was the only one on the county road at the time but there were cars that were going north on gem road when it crossed over them with the lights off.  i was determined to find out what this object was so i reported to the cia, fbi and the faa. i was told that the military could not confirm or deny any object on radar.  i believe the object flies just under the radar.  it was low just above the tree tops. i believe it used the side lights like we use our headlights on cars to keep away from power lines, etc.  i was always looking in the area to see if i seen anything else when a couple of months later i saw three orange lights in perfect distance apart just above the tree line in the same area but south of county road 300 west.  i never saw the object but i believe these lights were the same side lights i has seen on the object in april just from the spacing and the large round lights.  they were orange this time but it was arount 4:30 pm in the afternoon.  i was driving one afternoon and spotted a large reddish orange basketball size ball above the tree line in the same wooded area.  also, i was coming home on a sunday night about 8pm one evening when i saw a strange thing occur. it looked like a misty cloud over the exact tree line area i first saw the object in april. the misty cloud was like hovering over the tree line when it suddenly shot to the east up into the clouds.  it was in august i believe and was still somewhat light outside.  i have never seen any cloud look or act like this one. i have been ridiculed and laughed at by me family and oddly my friends that are close believe that i saw an object that was unconventional.  i have told people it may be something we have made but it runs off of a different propulsion system than we are familiar with today. i am concerned due to the fact that some object unfamiliar to me in flying withing 1/4 mile from my only grandson's house.  i want to know what it is and why does it act so strange.  i did have burning to my eyes and my nails on my left hand cracked and broke off.  i had a funny feeling in my body like something crawling under my skin for a couple of days.  i would not want anyone to attempt to get any closer that i did to this object and i would advise you to stay in your car or get under something if you ever encounter any object you cannot identify.  also, i have been in contact with an elderly couple who seen an object they described as cigar shaped on the ground at the edge of this woods on county road 200 west which is the next road north of where i saw the object. i believe it has a pattern and time of year it appears.  the elderly couple said they had seen the object in april, 2006 about the same time of year and the first week of april.  i will be equipped next year to get this thing on tape and pictures if i am not so amazed that if forget what to do. i have spoken to jerry sivers several times in reference to my sighting.  i will answer any questions you might have about my sighting. i can tell you i am 60 years old and i do not drink or take drugs and i don't even smoke.  i have never been treated for any mental problems and consider myself a normal average working grandma that loves her family.   i don't worry about myself but about the future generation and the security of our country.  it seems to me nobody knows what to do when someone reports something like this.  the usaf has been told to ignore and dismiss reports since project blue book was closed but our country also ignored the terriorist attact possibility that happened in new york. i hope we do not ignore signs and reports and find out too late we could and should have taken these sightings as important and significant to the security of our citizens and country.
content.summary: Observed object hover black & rectangular then closer view changed to circular object on 4/6/07.

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were staying in a country hotel it was a lovely sunny day with a slight breeze and we were about to leave when i took 2 pictures of the grounds only to find some strange objects on the first picture .
it was not until we arrived home and i downloaded them onto my computer did i notice the strange objects.
they may be nothing at all but if you could check them for me that would be great.
thanx for your time.
content.summary: Not known

content.detailedDescription:
Hello my name is jeff

     i was driving my 2008 dodge avenger down hwy 401 on my way to london international airport. i had reach london and i had to drive back to a service station where i had gotten gas and forgotten to pay for it (note i did to return to pay after i realized what happened) on my way back to my hotel room where my gf and her mother where waiting for me to return. at approx. 10:30 pm to 11:00 pm eastern time i was driving to my hotel when i noticed a bright star in the sky. being i am a novice astronomer and the sky crystal clear i took note of the star thinking it was brighter than normal so i figured it was a planet, becuase at the time i believe venus was exceptionally visible by the human eye and telescope. so i continued thinking nothing of it until the star shot off like a bullet from a gun it was white with a tail behind it. when i noticed what the object had done i reacted with a combination of trepidation and amasment and being i was driving and 100 kmh/60 mph. and i had traffic behind me so i couldnt stop to take a real close look at the sky. after the object streaked across the sky the star was gone the whole event took less than a few seconds. also this may be entirely seperate and my perceptions being altered being i was under extreme stress from not paying the gass but as i was driving to the hotel from the service station the first time it only took 30 to 45 min to reach my hotel the first time when i drove back to the service station it took me an hour and a half to get to the staion though i travelled the same amount of distance and when i drove back to the hotel again an hour and 30 mins to return and i was driving faster on my return trip, aprox 110 to 115 kmh.
content.summary: Light shoots across sky

content.detailedDescription: First noticed red, bright round object making erratic movement, right left, up and down. spiraling, zig-zaging, dropping and picking back up quickly behind the trees. it pulsed red, orange, green, blue, gold, white randomly and dimmed and pulsed every once in a while. video camera wouldn't pick it up, though through binoculars it had a spherical shape to it and seemed to have a white light on top of whatever it was. after moving alot for about 30 to 40 minutes, it stopped suddenly and dimmed a little to where it seemed like an ordinary star, but it picked back up about 25 minutes later and started moving again, though not as much as before. we watched it until it went to the horizen and went out of sight in the southeast direction from where we were standing.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright object in the southeastern sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I bought a home at the edge of a canyon neer around the town of paradise.  within the first year i began hearing a high pitched sound that resembled a misqueto on the ceiling of my bedroom directally above my head. 
as time went on i heard this sound neer the light bar above the mirror in the bathroom. later i noticed that it was following me around the house and into the bathroom late at night or early in the morning when it was quiet. this activity really began to bother me, so i tried to get it to leave by voiceing my illfeelings to it in a loud, threatening tone.
to cut to the chase, in the summer of 2005 after watching a movie on tv, i looked out of my office window which overlooks the canyon. there was a large bright object in the sky in the east at about 10 oclock in the sky at about 12 midnight. i thought it must be a helicopter hovering. so i went out on the back porch and didn't hear anything. i sat down and noticed that it was hovering. it was not holding it's position, but slightly bobbing up and down and side to side. with a telephoto lense on my camera i could see a dazzling, sparkeling object with intermittant blue and red flashes. 
i began hearing the distinct sound of humanoids walking in my bedroom in the night and finally contacted a few local physics to look into the situation.
i have taken photo's of being's in my bedroom and some of the lightcraft in the sky.
this activity still continues today, and i have reason to believe they have been tracking, and studying me all my life, and in many other past lives.
i believe that they have been intentionally isolating me for their purposes. and they have been meddeling in my fianancial affairs and are screening me away from involvement with the ladies.
this negitive involvement in my life is totally unacceptable to me and it's time to get these monkeys off my back. i have contacted jeremy, a mufon field investigator in sacramento.
content.summary: Ongoing visitations from lightbeings in a variety of lightcraft, nightly sinse 2005 years

content.detailedDescription:
Mother-on july 5, 2007 at 11:30 pm i was driving east.  in front of me an oject( at first believed to be a plane) looked like it was going to land. (two headlights on front, shinning through the fog.)  we stopped the car so it could land, but it stopped in mid-air, i turned right and it turned with us.  we would go, it would go, we would stop , it would stop.

i rolled down my car window, looked up and saw a triangular shaped object with pink and blue lights.( it made no sound!)  my daughter was crying for me to drive.  we got home in our house.  went to the front window.  it was sitting (hovering) in front of house and slowly starting going towards the house across the road, barely over trees over their house.  turned to right and continued back on its course. (the bottom of craft looked like the underneath of a car.)

daughter-traveling east we were turning right onto another road when we spotted the white headlights peering through the fog in front of us.  we hesitated as the object turned with us and stopped when we did and went when we did.  looking above us we saw a triangular figure with pink and blue lights (very few).  we frantically rolled down the windows to hear silence.  the object stayed stationary for an unreal amount of time.  we speeded off towards the house and the "object" went back to its orginal path barely making it over the 2 story farm house.

when we first stopped it was thought to be a plane.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw object approaching which thought was an aircraft, but the oject got closer and appeared to hover

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend steven were traveling on highway 1876 around 8:00 pm,on the border of bourbon and lexington.We saw a very bright spot light signaling on the other side of the hill.Steven turned his head lights off,and said look its the bat signal.I laughft and said it was a air port becon ,but he said there was no airport over there.When we got over the hill we saw a huge structure.The back of it was a huge dome and in the front  was a smaller dome with a couple of rows of the spot lights we were seeing.And on the smaller dome was a golden cross that came out of the top.To the left was a vertical disk shaped object that was blue.It all was shinning like it was covered in florecent light.The domes were a redish color.The first thing i said was is this the coming of christ.We were approching this structure fast.We pulled over to the side.I dont think it knew we were there.Because of steven turning his headlight off.Then the cross started to spin really fast,and orbs started flying everywhere.Then the blue wheel started to charge and a energy field covered the object like a huge dome.You could see electric veins inside the energy field and we could feal the static.Then with out any warning it dissipeared like it changed frequencies.This happened in a feild on a horse farm there is a couple of houses around the area but no one else was around.We ran to the spot it was at and we kept saying it was right here.It took me four years to acctually start investigating ufos.I have read alot of books on the subject and have not found too much info on what we saw.I have found some clues.And i have seen two other objects in the sky that may be linked to this machine,but what we saw was on the ground and we were close enough to see it work,i strongly believe that it was a interdiminsional time machine.I hope i can get answers and and help advise anyone who would want to investigate.         ronnie kenner
content.summary: See page below

content.detailedDescription: Triangle flew straight over me and my friend approximatly 200 feet high. moveing approximatly 25 mph.  also orbs appearing to move slowly then stop then move away at great speeds.Also what looks like laser beams in the night sky.I also saw in the day time two white sphere like objects joined by a straight line.All of these sightings have been observed in the months of nov. and december on every clear night.
content.shape: Cigar,  Diamond,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Triangle,  Other
content.summary: Lights moveing in unbeliveble patterns.Triangle shaped air craft . and diamond shaped air craft.

content.detailedDescription:
Event; 12-11-07...At approximatly 1800 hours...Dark outside...Clear sky, no clouds, nothing but stars...  facing west at about 11;00 high, almost straight up...Bright object, size of a quarter at arms length...  looked like comet pictures, bright head w/ cone shaped white wide tail, not long tail, reminded me of what the shuttle blastoff is like with the short but bright cone tail, but entering orbit. when we first seen it it was coming towards earth, head of it like a star with cone tail, kept coming towards us,but at orbit high...Then after about 10-15 minutes it seemed to be moving away with the tail getting fog like, and couldn't see the bright head or front of the object...Then dimmer and dimmer until it looked like a haze in the pitch black sky. throughout the whole time it never traveled more than 6 inches, at arms length, across the sky.

everyone seen it here, daughter was visiting, she took video but she hasn't checked it yet,  called my brother in marco island, an hour south of us, he seen it also, looked the same...

checked for comets, missiles online...Nothing...

anyone that can figure out what it was or seen it, please let me know.
thanks,
bryan
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Cone,  Sphere,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Unknown

content.detailedDescription: It was in the sky moveing show standing still in the sky with three lights at each corner of the sky. blue light at the bottom.On us hwy 19 north at 2.00 o clock high.It moved up and down standing still. i was on my way home. i always new there were ufos. i think there ufos i think there from the future.
content.summary: A v like ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling home after work on the second shift when i spotted this ufo the vehicle was about the size of two large cargo vans approximately 23 feet log by 10 feet wide with a height of 5 feet. the shape was that of a chevron and the material from which it was made appeared to glow a brilliant orange on the bottom and a light yellow on the top almost like the color of the sun.
the vehicle appeared above the crest of what is known as briggs hill in warren county. it was traveling at a very slow rate of speed in a ne direction towards bowling green and descending and decelerating at the same time. 
when it passed over my truck in which i already had stopped to observe it���s approach it was a mere 300feet and heading it's would have put it in a field some 900 feet from where i was parked. it vanished into the star field just as it passed over my truck. 
i believe at that point they observed my observing them and that is why the disappeared or should i say cloaked.
my belief is that these vehicles are from earth most likely time travelers coming back to re engineer the past or simply to observe the past.Perhaps the survivors of wwiii.
content.summary: Chevron type silent vehicle,glowing a translucent orange on the bottom and light yellow on the top.

content.detailedDescription:
I don't smoke in the house so i was standing on back porch doorstep when i cought a glimpse of a bright light to my left.
turning to face it i was amazed to see what i can only describe as a circle, looking like the moon without the craters/mountains.
this was approx. 1/4 mile away coming over the hill at about 200 feet up, from this distance it looked the size of a large football, it was travelling slowly (helicopter speed, judging by our police helicopter).
i kept watching as it moved across in front of me dissapearing behind the house next door.
it seemed to be travelling as if it would land several miles away, i thought it could be the isle of angelsey or the irish sea.
i imagine the time taken to go out of sight was approx. 4 seconds. it was hard to belive what i had just seen, i just had to assume it was a ufo.
i would love to know if other people have seen anything like this, i just wish i had phoned the police or coastguard then i may have heard more about it.
i just stood there amazed, excited and perplexed, i kept looking in the direction from which it had come.
i could not belive it when approx 4 seconds later i saw another identical object on an identical course come over the hill at exactly the same place.
yet again another 4 seconds or so later another same size object came over on the same course as the previous two.
the only difference between this object and the other two was that this one was the colour of the setting sun and a large amount of sparks where coming from the rear, the movement of it was exactly the same as the other two.
there was no sound whatsoever from any of these objects.
i do not particulary look for objects in the sky although i have seen the usual man made things which have been identifiable.
i also do not take drugs or drink!
content.summary: 3 ufos 4 seconds apart looked like 2 moons & 1 setting sun
